利申：英文好撚差


Hello -

Thank you very much for the recent order you placed through Filson. I’m writing because your Order #xxxxxxxxxx has been flagged by our system for review.

In order for us to process this order, we will need you to verify the authorization code for this transaction. This can be done by simply contacting your credit card company (typically Visa, Mastercard, Discover, or American Express) and requesting the 6-digit authorization code for this transaction.

Also we were having some difficulty confirming the billing address you provided for your order. In order for us to process this order, the billing address listed on the order must match the address on file with your credit card company.

Lastly, in reviewing your order it seems that you have requested Filson ship to a third party shipper. If you choose to proceed with the third party shipper, Filson cannot be held responsible if your order is received damaged or does not arrive at all. Third party shippers are not covered by the Filson warranty. Filson can only guarantee that your package arrives to the shipping address listed on the order. Filson offers international shipping and rates can be found online. If you opt for a return or exchange, you will be responsible for shipping your item to our Returns Team in Seattle for our standard Return/Exchange Evaluation. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with the third party shipper or if you would like me to adjust the shipping address on the order.

The authorization code, billing address, as well as the third party shipping policy may be confirmed by phone, email, or chat. Filson Customer Service is open 6 AM – 6 PM PST Monday – Friday and 7 AM – 4 PM PST on Saturday. In addition to the authorization code, please have your order number on hand for reference.
It is our priority to make sure that our online customers are provided a safe and secure service, which is why we request confirmation of the authorization code. This order may be held in this manner until Tuesday, February 14th. If no response is received by that date the order must be canceled.

If you have any more questions feel free to email me or call Customer Service.

All the Best,

Customer Service
1741 1st Avenue South ∞ Seattle WA 98134
T (800) 624-0201
F (206) 622-4539

www.Filson.com
依家你張卡比唔到錢，所以外國間公司唔會process住。等你俾錢。依家你要打電話去你付款張信用卡公司叫佢哋confirm你個次既付款。
另外你要重新provide過billing address，姐係收據寄去個地址，呢個address要比你屋企地址or住宅，而非轉運公司地址
